discussion.content: There is context. Here is the definition of Connected Customer Service - Enables organizations to transform their service model into a proactive and predictive service model with the availability of IoT diagnostics, IoT device update, and case management on one platform. Agents using Customer Service Hub can diagnose and fix issues remotely, which leads to cost savings and improved customer satisfaction - See here - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-service/cs-iot-overview

questions.question_text:
You attend a tradeshow. A fellow attendee suggests that you implement Dynamics 365 Connected Customer Service.
What is a valid use case for Dynamics 365 Connected Customer Service?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
To renew a canceled or expired entitlement, open the entitlement, and then on the command bar, select Renew. A new entitlement will be created, and its status is set to "Draft", while the canceled or expired entitlement will remain as is. 


https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-service/administer/create-entitlement-define-support-terms-customer

Selected Answer: B
Waiting status indicates that the entitlement has expired and is waiting for renewal.

Selected Answer: D
D, existing entitlement is cancelled, as the expiry date has already passed
D, To renew a canceled or expired entitlement, open the entitlement, and then on the command bar, select Renew.
yes thats correct.

You need to help the customer service manager make the changes.
Which status indicates that an entitlement must be renewed?

customer voice

"Tom uses internet searches and social networking websites to gather general information about the lead such as industry, number of employees, and annual revenue and enters it into the lead.

LinkedIn Compaign Manager helps you manage your ad compaigns in LinkedIn like publications etc. Nothin to do with leads which are potential customers.

1. Dynamics 365 Customer Voice
2. LinkedIn Campaign Manager (At least one LinkedIn member with access to LinkedIn Campaign Manager must Authorize Dynamics 365 to sync data from LinkedIn Campaign Manage)
3. Customer Insights

Correct => 1st - Dynamics 365 Cust. Voice / 2nd - LinkedIn Campaign Manager ( See my comment below FOR SURE )/ 3rd - Dynamics 365 Customer Insights 

1st question is about the "effectiveness of a marketing campaign" "Linkedin Sales Navigator" is used for the sales module/Dynamics 365 Customer Insights is to gather "Analytical data" "NOT FEEDBACK", ONLY "Customer Voice" allows the customer to provide a "FEEDBACK"
2nd Question - As it's a "Marketing" activity, I am going with the "keyword" on the answer Linkedin "Campaign" Manager as "Campaign' is a term used in marketing ( i could be wrong here ) 
3rd Question needs a "Unified View" from "Different sources" "Customer Insights" is the View or what I would call a Dashboard that provides this into
